subtitle: A quick and simple store cupboard relish.

method.text: Heat the oil and gently cook the salad onions for 5 min. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 min.
Drain the tomatoes, reserving the juice. Gradually stir the juice into the pan. Finely chop the tomatoes and put in the pan. Bring to boil, stirring.
Stir in the Worcestershire sauce and season to taste. Cook for 1 min. Cool, then chill. Serve with cold meats.

title: Quick tomato relish
